text: Lebern is one of the 10 districts of the canton of Solothurn, Switzerland, found in the west of the canton. Lebern district has these municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area, km² Balm bei Günsberg 209 5.46 Bellach 5079 5.28 Bettlach 4775 12.20 Feldbrunnen-St. Niklaus 869 2.47 Flumenthal 999 3.09 Grenchen 15,951 26.08 Günsberg 1129 5.28 Hubersdorf 655 1.40 Kammersrohr 40 0.94 Langendorf 3523 1.93 Lommiswil 1458 5.76 Niederwil 361 2.28 Oberdorf 1678 11.94 Riedholz 1607 4.92 Rüttenen 1400 8.80 Selzach 2918 19.51 Total 42,651 117.34
title: Lebern District
